Investigate the Beach Notes & Tips

Watch out, your vampire get damaged in the water, better to leave him at the camp, or on the cliffs Take positions on the cliffside roads, and get the advantage of high ground, only send one party member to the child Silence spell, speed potion can make a difference, take the harpies one-by-one
